entities.name: ElizaOS
entities.description: An AI operating system focused on creating a 'generative economy' and AI agent deployment.
entities.visual_hints: Minimalist, possibly blue or green hues, abstract geometric shapes, modern typography.

entities.name: AI16Z
entities.description: An older token that is undergoing migration to ElizaOS tokens.
entities.visual_hints: Possibly metallic or futuristic, could have sharp edges or circuit-like patterns.

entities.name: Eliza Cloud
entities.description: A new product for AI agent deployment being developed by ElizaOS.
entities.visual_hints: Cloud imagery, interconnected nodes, sleek and modern interface design.

entities.name: Knowledge Functionality
entities.description: A feature within ElizaOS that allows for information retrieval from text files, with specific similarity thresholds.
entities.visual_hints: Book or document icon, magnifying glass, perhaps a neural network visualization.

entities.name: MCP Server Connections
entities.description: Connections to Machine Conversation Protocol servers, with recommendations for using mcp-gateway.
entities.visual_hints: Server racks, network cables, abstract communication symbols.

entities.name: Generative Treasury
entities.description: A treasury that will receive a portion of migrated tokens for ecosystem development.
entities.visual_hints: Gold or treasure chest imagery, interwoven with abstract technology elements.

entities.name: Discord
entities.description: A communication and community platform used for discussions and technical issues.
entities.visual_hints: Purple and white color scheme, stylized chat bubble or game controller icon.

entities.name: Odilitime
entities.description: A participant in discussions and team member involved in partnership activities and airdrops.
entities.visual_hints: No specific visual hints provided; possibly related to time or measurement.

entities.name: Tally
entities.description: A platform used to create forms for collecting information, such as Solana wallet addresses.
entities.visual_hints: Checkmark or list icon, simple form design, potentially green or neutral colors.

entities.name: Solana
entities.description: A blockchain platform for which wallet addresses are being collected.
entities.visual_hints: Sun or sunrise imagery, often depicted in orange, yellow, and purple gradients.

entities.name: MCP Gateway
entities.description: A recommended tool for making remote connections to MCP servers.
entities.visual_hints: Gate or portal imagery overlaid on network or server icons.

entities.name: Event Bus Refactoring
entities.description: A development task focused on restructuring the event bus in Eliza.
entities.visual_hints: Abstract representation of data flow or bus topology, possibly with arrows and nodes.

entities.name: API Explorer
entities.description: An interface, potentially a Swagger UI, for exploring APIs, offered as part of a SaaS product.
entities.visual_hints: Code brackets, documentation interface, clean UI elements.

entities.name: API SaaS
entities.description: Software as a Service offering that provides API access.
entities.visual_hints: Cloud icon combined with API notation like curly braces or arrows.

entities.name: Sam-developer
entities.description: A developer working on implementing an API Explorer for a SaaS offering.
entities.visual_hints: No specific visual hints provided; a professional, generic developer avatar could be used.

entities.name: 0xbbjoker
entities.description: A participant seeking confirmation on implementation approaches for event bus refactoring.
entities.visual_hints: No specific visual hints provided; might incorporate gaming or futuristic elements associated with 'joker'.

entities.name: Shaw
entities.description: A developer suggesting a focus on major handlers like voice and image for event bus refactoring.
entities.visual_hints: No specific visual hints provided; a professional, generic developer avatar could be used.

entities.name: MetaDAO
entities.description: A project mentioned in discussions, possibly related to decentralized autonomous organizations.
entities.visual_hints: Abstract geometric shapes, possibly incorporating DAO or community symbols.

entities.name: Futarchy-as-a-Service
entities.description: A service related to the futarchy governance model.
entities.visual_hints: Scales of justice combined with service or cloud icons, possibly incorporating voting symbols.

entities.name: GitHub
entities.description: A platform used for hosting code repositories and project development summaries.

entities.name: Zod v4
entities.description: A modern data validation library being upgraded across the ElizaOS ecosystem.
entities.visual_hints: Abstract 'Z' symbol, clean typography, possibly a shield or checkmark for validation.

entities.name: Renovate
entities.description: An automated dependency management tool used across ElizaOS plugin repositories.
entities.visual_hints: Robot or cogwheel icon, representing automation and maintenance.

entities.name: Discord plugin
entities.description: A plugin for ElizaOS that enhances interaction with the Discord platform.
entities.visual_hints: Discord logo elements integrated with a plugin or puzzle piece icon.

entities.name: Text and Image Generation
entities.description: Future agent skills being planned, involving the capability to generate text and images.
entities.visual_hints: Pencil or brush icon combined with text document icon, neural network imagery.

entities.name: Plugin Relay
entities.description: A new plugin added to the official ElizaOS plugin registry.
entities.visual_hints: Relay or communication tower icon integrated with plugin symbols.

entities.name: Plugin Registry
entities.description: An official registry where ElizaOS plugins are made discoverable.
